org.opends.server.api

Interface ExtensibleMatchingRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MatchingRule

    @PublicAPI(stability=VOLATILE,
           mayInstantiate=false,
           mayExtend=true,
           mayInvoke=false)
public interface ExtensibleMatchingRule
extends MatchingRule
    This interface defines the set of methods that must be implemented by a Directory Server module that implements an Extensible matching rule.

    • Method Summary

      Returns an index query appropriate for the provided attribute value assertion.

      Returns a collection of extensible indexers associated with this matching rule.

        getAllNames, getDescription, getName, getNameOrOID, getOID, getSyntaxOID, isObsolete, normalizeAssertionValue, normalizeValue, toString, valuesMatch

    • Method Detail

      • getIndexers

        java.util.Collection<ExtensibleIndexer> getIndexers(IndexConfig config)
        Returns a collection of extensible indexers associated with this matching rule.
        Parameters:
        config - The index configuration to be used by this matching rule.
        Returns:
        The collection of extensible indexers associated with this matching rule.

      • createIndexQuery

        <T> T createIndexQuery(ByteSequence assertionValue,
                     IndexQueryFactory<T> factory)
                   throws DirectoryException
        Returns an index query appropriate for the provided attribute value assertion.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of index query created by the factory.
        Parameters:
        assertionValue - The attribute value assertion.
        factory - The index query factory which should be used to construct the index query.
        Returns:
        The index query appropriate for the provided attribute value assertion.
        Throws:
        DirectoryException - If an error occurs while generating the index query.
